PLAY.TITLE: The Tragedy of Julius Caesar

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: triumvirs after death of Julius Caesar.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: ARTEMIDORUS Of Cnidos, a teacher of rhetoric.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Rome: the neighbourhood of Sardis: the neighbourhood of Philippi.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rome. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter FLAVIUS, MARULLUS, and certain Commoners

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter CAESAR; ANTONY, for the course;
CALPURNIA, PORTIA, DECIUS BRUTUS, CICERO, BRUTUS,
CASSIUS, and CASCA; a great crowd following, among
them a Soothsayer
Sennet. Exeunt all except BRUTUS and CASSIUS
Sennet. Exeunt CAESAR and all his Train, but CASCA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Thunder and lightning. Enter from opposite sides,
CASCA, with his sword drawn, and CICERO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rome. BRUTUS's orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the conspirators, CASSIUS, CASCA, DECIUS
BRUTUS, CINNA, METELLUS CIMBER, and TREBONIUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. CAESAR's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Thunder and lightning. Enter CAESAR, in his
night-gown

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAESAR
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter PUBLIUS, BRUTUS, LIGARIUS, METELLUS, CASCA,
TREBONIUS, and CINNA

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A street near the Capitol.
SCENE IV. Another part of the same street, before the house of BRUTUS.
SCENE I. Rome. Before the Capitol; the Senate sitting above.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
A crowd of people; among them ARTEMIDORUS and the
Soothsayer. Flourish. Enter CAESAR, BRUTUS,
CASSIUS, CASCA, DECIUS BRUTUS, METELLUS CIMBER,
TREBONIUS, CINNA, ANTONY, LEPIDUS, POPILIUS,
PUBLIUS, and others

CAESAR goes up to the Senate-House, the rest
following

CASCA first, then the other Conspirators and
BRUTUS stab CAESAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The Forum.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BRUTUS and CASSIUS, and a throng of Citizens

Exit CASSIUS, with some of the Citizens. BRUTUS
goes into the pulpit

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BRUTUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter ANTONY and others, with CAESAR's body

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A house in Rome.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: ANTONY, OCTAVIUS, and LEPIDUS, seated at a table

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Camp near Sardis. Before BRUTUS's tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Drum. Enter BRUTUS, LUCILIUS, LUCIUS, and
Soldiers; TITINIUS and PINDARUS meeting them

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Brutus's tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Poet, followed by LUCILIUS, TITINIUS, and LUCIUS
Re-enter LUCIUS, with wine and taper

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The plains of Philippi.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter OCTAVIUS, ANTONY, and their army

Drum. Enter BRUTUS, CASSIUS, and their Army;
LUCILIUS, TITINIUS, MESSALA, and others
Exeunt OCTAVIUS, ANTONY, and their army

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. The field of battle.
SCENE III. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum. Re-enter MESSALA, with BRUTUS, CATO,
STRATO, VOLUMNIUS, and LUCILIUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum. Enter fighting, Soldiers of both armies;
then BRUTUS, CATO, LUCILIUS, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BRUTUS, DARDANIUS, CLITUS, STRATO, and
VOLUMNIUS

Alarum. Retreat. Enter OCTAVIUS, ANTONY, MESSALA,
LUCILIUS, and the army
